scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:demo
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client && bun run build:integration
scripts.dev: bun run build:packages && concurrently -n packages,demo "bun run dev:packages" "bun run dev:demo"
scripts.dev:packages: concurrently -n shared,server,client,integration "bun run --filter astro-grab-shared dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab-server dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab-client dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab dev"
scripts.clean: bun run --filter './packages/*' clean && bun run --filter demo clean
scripts.link:packages: for dir in packages/*; do (cd "$dir" && bun link); done
